name: ProjectAlpha
body:
### Welcome to ProjectAlpha!  
ProjectAlpha a capable high performance trading software with strong focus on automation.  
It provides a complete tool chain for design, code, test and RUN your trading algorithm's.  
The trading strategy deployment has collocation in mind - so all trading strategies are hosted on server side!  
For sure there is a client to manage and monitor the deployed trading strategies.  
If you want to try out, feel free to download the latest release!

### Docomentation
Please find the documentation here: 
[GitHub Wiki](https://github.com/algorythmntrader/ProjectAlpha/wiki)    
  
### Important Note  
Despite it runs quite stable - in current state it's for designing trading strategies and testing only.  
Don't use it in a live production environment!
Use this software on your own risk!

### Authors and Contributors
This project was founded by [algorythmn'trader](https://github.com/algorythmntrader/ProjectAlpha).  
If you like, take a read at my [Blog...](https://algorythmntrader.wordpress.com/)
    
### Support or Contact
Having trouble with it? Or just want to say hello?  
Let me know here algorythmn.trader@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
